nodes.text: The Halls of Knowledge were storehouses of Jedi information on the planet Phateem.

It was once the largest repository of Force-imbued artifacts in the galaxy and included in the list of the Twenty Wonders of the Galaxy by Vicendi in 10,000 BBY. A vital location of the Jedi Order, most items found in its collection were later scattered to Jedi facilities on Ossus, Coruscant, Dantooine, Ilum, and Kamparas.
